attributes.action: Limit postal/proxy votes to valid absence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Postal voting  allows "Heads of families" to vet and influence the votes of their sons, daughters and wives. This works against the rights of women, particularly in minority communities. Sickness or business absence must always be a resonable excuse. The one is covered by medical certification, the latter by PERSONAL voting on an alternative date. Pass this on!
